description:
Fr. Mike reflects on Hezekiah's righteousness as king of Judah, and his pivotal work of restoring true worship and removing false idols. By undoing all of the corrupt things his father king Ahaz did, Hezekiah shows us that our ancestors do not define our destiny. Today's readings are 2 Kings 18, 2 Chronicles 29, and Psalm 141.
For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear.
